__e: My son, Anthony, he's a good boy.
Anthony is a friend of mine. A very good friend.
Any friend of Anthony's is a friend...
He disappointed me, Anthony, in ways that I can't even begin to tell you.
So, Mr. Reese, Anthony over here Tells me you just got back from a trip?
I'd like to know if Anthony ever thought of me cos I've thought of him every day.
- Damn it, Anthony, I see you!
Anthony, I always knew I could count on you.
What you seen today, Anthony... a very sad thing.
Why are you apologising? Anthony was dying and she still wouldn't tell him about you.

All right, Anthony, you and Jimmy guard this entrance, load the food as it comes in. You guys come with me.
